Anthony -- St. Vincent and the Grenadines / Frederick Ballantyne and Ralph Gonsalves -- Samoa / Malietoa Tanumafili II and Tuilaepa Sailele Malielegaoi -- San Marino / Giuseppe Maria Morganti and Mauro Chiaruzzi -- Sao Tome and Principe / Fradique de Menezes and Maria das Neves -- Saudi Arabia / Fahd -- Senegal / Abdoulaye Wade and Idrissa Seck -- Seychelles / France Albert Rene -- Sierra Leone / Ahmed Tejan Kabbah -- Singapore / Sellapan Rama Nathan and Goh Chok Tong -- Slovakia / Rudolf Schuster and Mikulas Dzurinda -- Slovenia / Janez Dmovsek and Anton Rop -- Solomon Islands / John Lapli and Allan Kemakeza -- Somalia / Abdulkassim Salat Hassan and Hassan Abshir Farah -- South Africa / Thabo Mbeki -- Spain / Juan Carlos I. and Jose Maria Aznar Lopez -- Sri Lanka / Chandrika Bandaranaike Kumaratunga and Ranil Wickremasinghe -- Sudan / Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir -- Suriname / Ronald Venetiaan and Jules Ajodhia -- Swaziland / Mswati III and Barnabas Sibusiso Dlamini -- Sweden / Carl XVI Gustaf and Goran Persson -- Switzerland / Pascal Couchepin -- Syria / Bashar al-Assad and Mohammad Mustafa Miro -- Taiwan / Chen Shui-bian and Yu Shyi-kun -- Tajikistan / Imomali Rakhmanov and Akil Akilov -- Tanzania / Benjamin Mkapa and Frederick Tluway Sumaye -- Thailand / Bhumibol Adulyadej and Thaksin Shinawatra -- Togo / Gnassingbe Eyadema and Koffi Sama Summary Succint narrative biographies of every serving head of state or head of government, covering some 200 countries and territories. Each country section contains a brief explanation of its type of government and the respective roles of the head of state, the head of government and the legislature; a listing of the most recent heads of state and head of government, with dates of office; biographical profiles of the current head of state and head of government, and other recent incumbents of these positions who remain significant and active political leaders; and a photographic section with pictures of many of the world's political leaders. Fully indexed by name, date of taking office, and source of authority
